Articles.Content:
Introducing Snowtiger's fifth spacecraft posted on the Spacecraft Exchange forum.

The Stingray Supersonic Bomber can reach speeds up to 330m/s while cruising.

It is very easy to control and can do some nice maneuvers like a loop-de-loop and barrel rolls.

It is not an SSTO.

**Features:**

4 Standard Jet Engines with Precoolers

4 Circular Air Intakes

Burritos in the glovebox

2 Headlights

2 Airbrakes

That plane looks good!

Also, can you pweaty please make a cargo-capable plane? (Not SSTO)
